In 100% seriousness, with clever Tweakscale use (and adding a 1.875m scale), you can have a fully functional Angara rocket as a stopgap. AFAIK, Angara might not be coming for a while, since Beale has his eyes on other stuff he wants to do.

Hi Beale!

Once started such changes Soyuz / Progress, by the way superb changes. You can make a separate heat shield for the Soyuz capsule?

P.S. Many thanks for excellent IVA for the Soyuz capsule! This update I waited most

In 100% seriousness, with clever Tweakscale use (and adding a 1.875m scale), you can have a fully functional Angara rocket as a stopgap. AFAIK, Angara might not be coming for a while, since Beale has his eyes on other stuff he wants to do.

Well with AB Launchers most of the parts you would need to make an Angara system are already there, granted you have to add tweakscale compatibility for the 1.875m size of the boosters.
Does anyone of you have a tantares LV and AB launchers config for tweakscale ? I am really rookie with those kind of plugins don't blame me if I am totally wrong

Here's a ModuleManager config for all AB Launchers tanks and engines, and some Tantares tanks and engines.

Also, copy-paste this scale type into your Tweakscale defaultscales config, replacing the first SCALETYPE entry:

SCALETYPE
{
    name = stack
    freeScale = false
    scaleFactors = 0.625, 1.25, 1.875, 2.5, 3.75, 5.0, 6.25, 7.5
    scaleNames = 62.5cm, 1.25m, 1.875m, 2.5m, 3.75m, 5m, 6.25m, 7.5m
    defaultScale = 1.25

	ATTACHNODES
	{
		base = 1
		top = Stack:1
		top01 = Stack:1
		top02 = Stack:1
		top03 = Stack:1
		bottom = Stack:1
		bottom01 = Stack:1
		bottom02 = Stack:1
		bottom03 = Stack:1
		bottom04 = Stack:1
	}
}

It adds a 1.875m size to the "stack" scale.
Wow, that's great ! Thank you for the fast answer, amazing !

I have had the same issue (in the VAB I have 3 different SRB's, but when I launch they're all the same part...) .... but I think that might have sth to do with the part configs I have made.....

Just popping in to admire the stuff

And 600 pages, almost a million views is really nice! In less than a year!

First off, say hello to the Roach!

http://i.imgur.com/az0M3xwl.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/HJbu5B9l.jpg

I let my roommate go at it with a pen, and an image of the Tantares Space Technologies logo, and it turned out great. It was initially going to be named "Polaris", but he ended up writing out P-O-A inadvertently, so it then became the "Roach." I'm on the university rocket team, and we're working on a Hybrid 2K. I'm going to try to bring the spirit of Tantares into the real world at some point hopefully.

Looks great all around. Good choices. To recap, how many new parts will be added for the optional no-neck Progress? Having trouble keeping track of which parts are just you experimenting, and which parts will actually get finalized. Will the added Progress parts be memory-free because of the texture sharing?

Makes me very happy to see this kind of thing, it's adorable! Here's hoping it flies true!

Parts: Just one part for the Progress, the very simple descent vehicle. No stats for it yet, but I guess science container (obviously) and a liberal amount of KIS space.

Edit: Yes they are memory free.

I've been attempting to make one, but no dice so far.

EDIT: Redid the alpha channel for the Tantares TMA textures. Now it really looks like thermal fabric. In light it shouldn't be totally flat and nonreflective, and all the imperfections and texturing in the thermal fabric is apparent.

http://i.imgur.com/oGuHRma.png

I'm looking into my fairing textures, and I might redo them in tga so they have alpha channels as well, and look better in the light. But that's a lower priority right now; I'm polishing TMA, and I'm also mucking about with the Mir textures, trying to get some color into the Mir Core Module (I stopped working on the Polaris-style texture, since I don't think it looks very good; but it's more or less finished and I'll release it this week). Looking at IRL Mir and Zarya for inspiration.

I custom-rescaled the Aerojet Kerbodyne ICPS lower tank for KVTK, so that's a more or less custom part. I also used the KSLO 2.5m engines, plus our dear friend TweakScale to get 1.875m sizing. Procedural Fairings for the interstage and payload fairing, Ven's Stock Revamp (I think) for radial reaction wheels I clipped inside the tanks, and that's it, I believe. The Space Shuttle Engines pack supplied the Angara 7.2 core engine (it's the straight SSME, standing in for the RD-0120).

Regarding releasing, cool yer jets! I'm very finicky with my textures so I'll make tons of small tweaks over a period of time. I'm considering revamping the PF textures entirely to add an alpha channel and make them look even nicer, but barring that you can expect a release of TMA, the textures and fairing shapes, and maybe some more Mir stuff by the end of this week.

Really nice work you have done!

Of course I would be more than happy to include alternate textures (And parts if you get them working) with the main download

2 Parts: I've never come across that one... I'd recommend a clean install!

Tantares and TantaresLV: TantaresLV is launch vehicles (Soyuz rocket, Proton, N-1), the things you can use to launch the spacecraft in Tantares. I could've choose a better name in hindsight. But, my English is never perfect.

- A little easter egg, somewhere!
